resources.string: Muscle Groups Selected, go to dice
Dislike one of your options? Tap to reroll that exercise, or reroll them all.
All these exercises are only suggestions. Perform only what you are comfortable with. Never push yourself over your limits, and listen to your body.
You are out of all rerolls for the day. Do you want to watch and ad for more?
